迷.definition: to bewilder; crazy about; fan; enthusiast; lost; confused

迷上.definition: to become fascinated with; to become obsessed with

迷不知返.definition: to go astray and to not know how to get back on the right path (idiom)

迷住.definition: to fascinate; to strongly attract; to obsess; to infatuate; to captivate; to enchant

迷你.definition: mini (as in mini-skirt or Mini Cooper) (loanword)

迷信.definition: superstition; to have a superstitious belief (in sth)

迷失.definition: to lose (one's bearings); to get lost

迷姦.definition: to drug and then rape sb

迷惑.definition: to puzzle; to confuse; to baffle

迷惑龍.definition: apatosaurus; former name: brontosaurus; also called 雷龍|雷龙[lei2 long2]

迷戀.definition: to be infatuated with; to be enchanted by; to be passionate about

迷暈.definition: to knock sb out with a drug; to render sb unconscious

迷津.definition: a maze; to lose the way; bewildering

迷漫.definition: vast haze; lost in boundless mists

迷笛.definition: Beijing Midi School of Music, est. 1993 (abbr. for 北京迷笛音樂學校|北京迷笛音乐学校[Bei3jing1 Mi2di2 Yin1yue4 Xue2xiao4])

迷航.definition: off course; lost (of ship or plane); having lost one's way

迷茫.definition: vast and indistinct; perplexed; bewildered; at a loss

迷藥.definition: knockout drops; incapacitating agent; Mickey Finn

迷誤.definition: mistake; error; to mislead; to lead astray

迷路.definition: to lose the way; lost; labyrinth; labyrinthus vestibularis (of the inner ear)

迷蹤羅漢拳.definition: Mizongyi, Mizong, My Jhong Law Horn - "Lost Track Fist" (Chinese Martial Art)

迷途知返.definition: to get back on the right path; to mend one's ways

迷離.definition: blurred; hard to make out distinctly

迷魂.definition: to bewitch; to enchant; to cast a spell over sb

迷魂湯.definition: potion given to souls before they are reincarnated, which makes them forget their previous life (aka 孟婆湯|孟婆汤[meng4po2tang1]); magic potion; (fig.) bewitching words or actions

迷魂藥.definition: magic potion; (fig.) bewitching words or actions; knockout drug; ecstasy; MDMA

迷魂陣.definition: stratagem to trap sb; to bewitch and trap

迷魂香.definition: a kind of sleeping gas or smoke used by thieves to incapacitate victims

迷鳥.definition: vagrant bird (a migrating bird which has lost its way); a vagrant
